en.title: Safe Rollout Checklist for MCP Launches
en.excerpt: A concise checklist to reduce avoidable incidents during first production launches.
en.seoTitle: Safe Rollout Checklist for MCP Launches
en.seoDescription: Use this rollout checklist to launch MCP integrations safely and reduce production incidents.

contentBlocks.heading: Runbook first, then release
paragraphs: The first launch should always include a clear runbook with rollback thresholds and owner contacts.
A checklist does not slow delivery, it protects delivery velocity over time.

contentBlocks.heading: Minimum launch checklist
paragraphs: If one item is missing, the release is not ready.
